There is an EV for a buyer at almost every price point. Cheapest electric car price in India starts at under Rs 10 lakh while the most expensive electric cars in India are priced upwards of Rs 3 crore.  Thanks to increasing charging infrastructure, new car buyers are choosing more EVs over petrol and diesel models thanks to their added range and low cost of ownership. Best electric cars in India Best electric cars in India include the Hyundai Creta EV , Tata Nexon EV , MG Windsor EV , Mahindra Be 6 , Mahindra XEV 9e , BYD Atto 3 , Hyundai Ioniq 5 and Kia EV6 . A: Electric cars have low running costs, they are environmentally friendly and have longer range. Q ) Which are the best electric cars in India under Rs 20 lakh? A: Best electric cars under Rs 20 lakh are Tata Nexon EV , Mahindra XUV400 , MG Windsor , Tata Punch EV and the MG Comet EV . Q ) Which electric cars in India have the highest range? A: Mahindra XEV 9e , Mahindra BE 6 , Kia EV9 , BYD Seal sedan, Porsche Macan Turbo EV , BMW i7 are the highest mileage cars and SUVs in India. Q ) Which are the best electric cars in India under Rs 50 lakh? A: Best electric cars under Rs 50 lakh include the Hyundai Creta EV , the Mahindra XEV 9e , the BYD Atto 3 , the MG ZS EV and the Tata Curvv EV . Q ) Which are the best electric cars in India above Rs 50 lakh?
